_header: For no mirth be thou too glad

BodRawD893.First Lines:
ffor no mytte be þou gladdeNe for no sorow be uowz to
                    made…
BodRawD893.Editions:
Macray,  William D. 
             Catalogi Codicum Manuscriptorum Bibliothecae Bodleianae…Pars V,
                Ricardi Rawlinson Codicum classes [A-D]…complectens.
         5 vols. Oxford: Clarendon, 1862-1900: 5.79.
